div.ab: Muhamad Alhayzari fled to Malaga but became King again. dethroned by 4th King

figure.note: Pen and ink drawing with watercolour, Arabic motto: miniature
King Abu Abdullah [though with shaky spelling][i.e. Muhammad XII of Granada, c. 1460-1533]

div.ab: Mahomad Aben Ozmin fled from 5th King
Juzef K.G buried in GenealarifeKing of Granada buried in Generalife [same spelling as Conde]
KG.King of Granada Muley Mahomad Nazar 14

Aben Juzef IzquierdoThe Left-Handed or el Hayzari deposed by Muhamad el Zaquir his primo Pequeñohis little cousin [Conde only has 'primo': cousin] 1430, but the usurper beheaded [symbol: therefore] Muley Alhayzari King again, Juzef Aben Alhamar next dethroned him. His sobrino nephew in 1444 Aben Ozmin deposed him

G.K.King of Granada Muhamad Aben Ozmin was prince of Aben Ismail but Ismail was primocousin of Ozmin Ozmin slew many great persons in AlhambraWG's addition: Conde has only 'la fortaleza' (the fortress)..
Muley Abul Hacen 6 King = Zoraya Sultana

Abu Abdallah el Zaquir prisoner to K.g of Spain 7th & 9th & last Kg of Granada El ChicoThis seems to be WG's addition to Conde: i.e. Muhammad XII of Granada, nicknamed Boabdil or 'El Rey Chico' (the Boy King) by the Christians.
Abdallah el Zagal 8th King. Granada Abu Abdilehi yields Almeria & Guadix 1491This seems to be WG's addition to Conde
El Zogoybi nephew of El Zagal.This seems to be WG's addition to Conde
su primahis cousin = K.G.King of Granada Muley Abul Hassan = Zoraya D of the AlcaydeDaughter of the Governor (alcaide) of Martos
div.note: Mostly notes on Conde, Historia de la dominacion, vol. 3, pp. 180-222, with a few additions by WG, presumably from other reading.
